text: Animaniacs is an American animated series made Wellesley Wild and Steven Spielberg. It first started showing on Hulu in 2020. It is a revival of the 1993 television show Animaniacs. ==Voice Cast== *Rob Paulsen - Yakko, Pinky, Dr. Scratchisniff *Tress MacNeille - Dot *Jess Harnell - Wakko *Natalie Palamides, Vanessa Marshall - Slappy *Stephanie Escajeda - Nora Rita Norita *Asher Bishop - Skippy *Kel Mitchell - Newt *Maurice LaMarche - Brain *William Salyers - Pesto *Trey Parker - Buttons *Frank Welker - Runt *John Mariano - Bobby *Christy Carlson Romano - Minerva *ChloÃ« Grace Moretz - Katie Kaboom ==Episodes== Season Episodes First episode Last episode 1 13 November 20, 2020 November 20, 2020 2 13 November 5, 2021 November 5, 2021 3 10 February 17, 2023 February 5, 2023 ==References== Notes Category:2020s American animated television series Category:2020s American comedy television series Category:2020s American children's television series Category:English-language television programs Category:Hulu original series
